revised_title: Investigations of the Golgi Apparatus and Vacuolar System in Cavia, Helix, and Abraxas through Intra-Vital Methods
tldr: The author examines the structure and function of the Golgi apparatus and vacuolar system in various organisms using intra-vital methods. They discuss the relationship between the Golgi apparatus and vacuoles, and the role of neutral-red staining in revealing the vacuolar system. The author also highlights the work of other researchers in the field and their findings on the vacuolar system in different species.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Cell Biology
